wikipedia_page.main: Chris Spence (born June 1970) is a British / New Zealand journalist and former political advisor on environmental issues and foreign affairs. He has spent almost 3 decades working internationally and in the United States on sustainable development, conservation, climate change, and health policy. In 2005, Chris published Global Warming: Personal Solutions for a Healthy Planet (ISBN 1403966982), which offers a description of the climate change problem and a practical guide to the solutions.
